comments.raw_text: A fellow user in the #firefox channel today wanted to inquiry about an order he placed in mid October without a response; I looked at the campaign page and noticed that there is no contact information for shipping inquiries. This should really be added as I couldn't tell the user who to contact at Mozilla.
comments.creator: aaron.train@gmail.com
